uk.gov.gchq.palisade.user.service.impl

Class SimpleUserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.palisade.user.service.impl.SimpleUserService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, UserService

    public class SimpleUserService
extends Object
implements UserService
    A SimpleUserService is a simple implementation of a UserService that keeps user data in the cache service.

    • Method Detail

      • applyConfigFrom

        public void applyConfigFrom(ServiceConfiguration config)
                     throws NoConfigException
        Description copied from interface: Service
        Gives the initial configuration to a service to allow it to configure itself. This method is called by the internal system to configure a service.

        Subclasses should override this implementation which does nothing.

        Subclasses should ONLY throws NoConfigException if a required configuration key is not present

        Specified by:
        applyConfigFrom in interface Service
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration
        Throws:
        NoConfigException - if some required element of the configuration is not present

      • recordCurrentConfigTo

        public void recordCurrentConfigTo(ServiceConfiguration config)
        Description copied from interface: Service
        Tells a service to save its configuration to the given configuration object. This method is called by the internal system to save a configuration.

        Subclasses should override this implementation which does nothing.

        Specified by:
        recordCurrentConfigTo in interface Service
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration to place initial configuration information into

      • getUser

        public CompletableFuture<User> getUser(GetUserRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: UserService
        Look up a user by their ID. The request contains the UserId to lookup from the UserService. If the requested UserId doesn't exist in this UserService then an exception will be thrown.
        Specified by:
        getUser in interface UserService
        Parameters:
        request - specifying the user ID to look up
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture which will be fulfilled with the user details

      • addUser

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> addUser(AddUserRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: UserService
        Adds the contained user to the UserService. The given request will contain the User which should be fully populated with all the necessary roles and justifications.
        Specified by:
        addUser in interface UserService
        Parameters:
        request - the request specifying the user with details to add
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture which will complete as $true once the user has been added
